nodes.text: This unidentified police droid was stationed on Coruscant around 21 BBY during the events of the Clone Wars.

This Guardian police droid and a fellow one were on patrol one night on the streets of Coruscan when they heard a scream coming from a nearby alley. They then rushed towards the location of the sound only to find Senator Padmé Amidala attacked by two bounty hunters, Robonino and Chata Hyoki. The droids told the bounty hunters they were under arrest, allowing Padmé Amidala enough time to get away from them. The bounty hunters did not surrender and started to attack the droids, destroying them.
This police droid was voiced by actor Tom Kane, who also voiced Yoda.
